body:
<% if 'color' in kwargs: cl = kwargs['color'] c = module.colors module.mode =cl module.r.write(c[cl][0]) module.g.write(c[cl][1]) module.b.write(c[cl][2]) %> \
Timeline Guide:

Pre-Session
Tank fills. Client enters room and showers. Session begins when client enters tank and presses button,
or 10 minutes after the presession starts.
Session
Tank Lights usually fade. Ends in 1 hour
Waiting for client to exit tank
Lights back on. Tank drains after client gets out or 2 minutes.
Postsession
Tank drains and filters. Client takes exit shower. Ends when filtering is done.
Ready
Tank is ready for next client.
Current Time: ${kaithem.widget.TimeWidget().render()}
Tank Status: ${module.statusdisplay.render()}
Time left in this stage of timeline: ${module.timedisplay.render()}
${module.start.render("Begin Pre-Session(Tank fill and shower time)")}${module.startshort.render("Begin Short PreSession")}
${module.forcestart.render("Force Begin Session From Presession")}
${module.forceend.render("Force End Session(Session>>Postsession)")}
${module.forceendpostsession.render("Force End PostSession(PostSession>>End)")}
${module.lightsduring.render(label="Don't do intro fadeout")} ${module.halfwaylight.render(label="Half-time indicator blink")}
${module.fadein.render(label="Intro Duration", unit="Seconds")} ${module.fadeout.render(label="Outtro Duration", unit="Seconds")}
r
